Package projectmanager

Class Project

java.lang.Object
projectmanager.Project
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Project
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class defines a Project object.

It is used by ProjectManager, and implements Serializable.

Changes from V1: code refactored, attributes encapsulated, instances now writable to file, and updateDeadLine, updateTotalPaid, and finalizeProject methods moved to ProjectManager.

* Changes from V2.0: Methods selectProject, generateInvoice, writeFinalized, viewAll, viewIncomplete, and viewPastDue moved here from ProjectManager. Method populateProjectsMap added.

Version:
V2.1 August 2021
Author:
J.E. Foster Â©
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project​(java.lang.String projectNum, java.lang.String projectName, java.lang.String buildType, java.lang.String physAddress, java.lang.String erfNum, java.lang.String totalFee, java.lang.String totalPaid, java.lang.String deadLine, java.lang.String architect, java.lang.String contractor, java.lang.String customer)
      Creates a Project.
      Parameters:
      projectNum - a String containing the project number
      projectName - a String containing the project name
      buildType - a String containing the type of building
      physAddress - a String containing the building's physical address
      erfNum - a String containing the ERF number
      totalFee - a String containing the total amount owed
      totalPaid - a String containing the total amount paid to date
      deadLine - a String containing the project deadline
      architect - a String containing the architect's name and surname
      contractor - a String containing the contractor's name and surname
      customer - a String containing the customer's name and surname

    • selectProject

      public static Project selectProject​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Project> map, java.lang.String userInput)
      Iterates through a hMap containing Projects, selects a Project according to user input, and then displays and returns the chosen Project.
      Parameters:
      map - a Map with String keys and Project values
      userInput - a String containing Project name or number.
      Returns:
      the Project object selected by the user (null if no project found)
      Since:
      V1

    • generateInvoice

      public void generateInvoice​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Person> map)
      Generates and displays a customer invoice if amount is outstanding.

      This method calculates the outstanding amount via the totalFee and totalPaid attributes of a selected Project, and displays an invoice containing all amounts and the customer's personal info (accessed via a hMap containing Person objects.

      Parameters:
      map - a Map with String keys and Project values
      Since:
      V2.0 (originally part of V1 finalizeProject)

    • writeFinalized

      public void writeFinalized()
      Writes (appends) finalized Project details to a txt file.

      This method catches IOException.

      Since:
      V2.0

    • viewAll

      public static void viewAll​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Project> map)
